channel.description: Recent content in Ux on Leon Barnard's Portfolio

item.title: Wireframing for Everyone
item.description: Wireframing for Everyone demystifies UI design through wireframes, by stripping away the decorative layer so that anyone can learn to construct a digital product and make it easy to use. Get it free.

item.title: Common Website Mistakes and How to Fix Them
item.description: Learn how to improve your website’s user experience! For each mistake you’ll learn what usually happens and why, what it looks like, and what to do about it.

item.title: Get Developers on Your Side by Making Their Job Easier
item.description: If you’ve never worked in the software industry before, learning the culture can be a huge part of your first year on the job.

item.title: Five Steps to Creating Great Wireframes
item.description: Good wireframes solve real problems and lead to strong products. From writing out the scenario to gathering inputs, here is a proven path to a great website or app.

item.title: How to Start a Wireframe Project
item.description: Four techniques to start a wireframe project from scratch and ensure that you dedicate enough time to the ideation phase, where the success of your product begins.

item.title: How to Use Wireframes with Design Systems
item.description: An alternative to pushing wireframes beyond their limits is to keep them low fidelity and let another tool do the work of specifying the look and feel.

item.title: UI vs. UX: A Culinary Comparison
item.description: This article will combine storytelling with analogy to approach the subject of explaining UX differently.

item.title: What is UI Design?
item.description: Learn to see like a UI designer by deconstructing an interface into its 4 layers: controls, patterns, design principles, and templates.

item.title: Wireframing for Beginners
item.description: Wireframing is an essential skill for UX Designers and other experience design participants. Learn how to get your wireframing off to the right start.

item.title: From the Classroom to the Cubicle: UX in the Real World
item.description: When you arrive at your first UX job you'll find conditions a little different than they were in the classroom.

item.title: Soft Skills for UX Designers
item.description: These practicable skills can be invaluable in getting your ideas and hard work into the end product.

item.title: Wireframing Tips for Getting Unstuck
item.description: Recognizing being stuck is the first step to getting unstuck. Here are 2 easy techniques with 11 practical strategies to help you break free from designer’s block.

item.title: Forget your Dream Job
item.description: I finally landed mine. And I was miserable.

item.title: The User Experience Gap
item.description: Every once in a while I’m reminded that there are still plenty of products out there that are in need of some serious UX love.

item.title: Using Wireframes with Agile User Stories
item.description: A step-by-step guide on how to use wireframes in your Agile User Stories. Tips: add just enough detail and focus on what developers really need to know.
